short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Created for remote daily stand-up meetings

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Created mainly for helping with deciding the turn order in remote daily standup meetings.

There is a lot of stuff that can be desired into this extension, feel free to come with ideas. Be aware that this is something I did very hastily and might improve on if I feel for it. With that being said, feedback is welcome :)

If you are a developer and would like to contribute: https://github.com/knopp10000/SimpleTurnOrderDecider
